The ship's board computer informed Daemos that the energy signature of 
Tarantulas was fading away. A few moments later, it had disappeared and was 
nowhere to be found.

Daemos:
Slag it!! You must be up to some trick... But you are not an essential part 
to my mission. Computer, open all frequencies for a general attention 
message.

To all cybertronians living here on Earth, I send my greetings to you. I am 
commander Daemos of the Tripredacus and I come here as a mercenary. My ship, 
the Hellgate, is a product of the advanced tripredacus technology and is 
also affordable to you. As for my nature... I guess you will see about it 
when we meet!
